title: Trump signs sweeping executive order to assert U.S. dominance in space
summary:
The White House issued a sweeping executive order on space policy Dec. 18 covering topics from NASA’s exploration plans to space security.

title: What problem is charging for Space Situational Awareness supposed to solve?
summary:
A recently issued Executive Order revises how the government implements Space Policy Directive-3, removing the longstanding expectation that basic space situational awareness (SSA) services, including conjunction warnings, would be provided without charge. This decision marks a departure not only from SPD-3, but from more than a decade of United States practice in which Congress and […]

title: Moon Mascot: NASA Artemis II ZGI Design Challenge
summary: Whose Moon Mascot design will join the Artemis II astronauts on their historic voyage around the Moon in early 2026? title: NASA Announces 2025 International Space Apps Challenge Global Winners
summary: NASA Space Apps announced Thursday 10 winners of the 2025 NASA Space Apps Challenge. title: Rocket Lab launches 4 novel DiskSat satellites for U.S. Space Force, NASA
summary: The STP-S30 mission was moved up five months on the launch manifest for Rocket Lab. This was the 20th launch of an Electron rocket in 2025.

title: NASA’s Hubble Sees Asteroids Colliding at Nearby Star for First Time
summary: Like a game of cosmic bumper cars, scientists think the early days of our solar system were a time of violent turmoil, with planetesimals, asteroids, and comets smashing together and pelting the Earth, Moon, and the other inner planets with debris. title: NASA, Boeing Test How to Improve Performance of Longer, Narrower Aircraft Wings
